verses.roman:
sabe meli' ucca kari' karena saṅkīrtane
ucca kari' kṛṣṇa-nāma kahena prabhura kāṇe

synonyms: sabe meli'-all together; ucca kari'-very loudly; karena—performed; saṅkīrtane—chanting of the holy name; ucca kari'-loudly; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; kahena—said; prabhura kāṇe—in the ear of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: They all performed saṅkīrtana, loudly chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa into the Lord's ear.
